title: CDC funds six new infection prevention centers (AHA - American Hospital Association)
text: ( Source : AHA - American Hospital Association ) AHA News Now Oct 5, 2015 The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention today awarded $11 million to create six new centers to help health care facilities prevent the spread of infectious
